directions: In a sterilized 1-pint Mason-type jar (sterilizing procedure ) pack chiles. In a small bowl stir together remaining ingredients until salt is dissolved and pour over chiles. Seal jar with lid. Let pepper vinegar stand at cool room temperature at least 3 weeks and up to 6 months.
ingredients: 6 ounces fresh red or green hot chiles such as cayenne, serrano, or Thai
title: Pepper Vinegar
